properties.description: We are opening St Stephens Church on a Wednesday morning from 10:30 - 12:30 as part of the warm places scheme. Please come and visit us for a cuppa biscuit and a chat. Or we have a service on each Wednesday at 10am come and join us for worship. Everyone is warmly welcomed.
properties.title: Warm Space - Robin Hoods Bay

properties.address: West Cliff Church, Albert Place, Skinner Street, Whitby. YO21 3AH
properties.description: Warm Room on Tuesday and Thursday. Feel free to pop in any time between 10:30 and 2:00 pm. Free tea and coffee are provided and you can chat; sit quietly and read the newspaper, watch a video or have a game of pool.
properties.title: Whitby Warm and Safe Space
